long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is obsolete. You can read the original description below.

---

When you shop on smile.amazon.com, a portion of the proceeds will go to support a charity of your choice. Use this extension to make sure all your Amazon shopping goes through Amazon Smile to maximize the support for your charity.

This extension is open source! You can view the code here: https://github.com/jeremyschlatter/always-smile

This extension was not created or endorsed by Amazon. Amazon is a trademark of Amazon.com, Inc.
